Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 0: Electron + SQLite scaffold

Add Electron to the Vite + React project with SQLite database support
and workspace folder selection.

- Add Electron, electron-builder, better-sqlite3, vite-plugin-electron
- Create electron/main.ts with BrowserWindow and app lifecycle
- Create electron/preload.ts with IPC bridge \(contextBridge\)
- Create electron/database/db.ts for SQLite initialization
- Create electron/workspace/manager.ts for workspace folder selection
- Create electron/ipc/ handlers for workspace operations
- Configure vite.config.ts for Electron builds
- Add postinstall script for native module rebuilding
- Database uses dual-location: userData default or user-selected workspace

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 1: Core Data Layer

- Products CRUD \(electron/database/queries/products.ts\)
- Taxonomy CRUD: personas, features, dimensions, dimension values
- Entities CRUD with junction tables for context tags
- Relationships CRUD with bidirectional queries
- Markdown file generation with YAML frontmatter
- IPC handlers and preload API for all operations

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
